name: mptxor

body.origin:
|- wn(wa(w1, w0))
-| wxo(w1, w0)
-| wi(wxo(w1, w0), wn(wa(w1, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(w0)
-| w1
-| wxo(w1, w0)
-| wi(wxo(w1, w0), wn(wa(w1, w0)))

comment: Modus ponendo tollens 2, one of the "indemonstrables" in Stoic logic. Note that this uses exclusive-or ` \/_ ` . See rule 2 on [Lopez-Astorga] p. 12 , rule 4 on [Sanford] p. 39 and rule A4 in [Hitchcock] p. 5 . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 3-Jul-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 12-Nov-2017.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 19-Apr-2019.)
